column5: Been out of the loop a while but i finally got myself logged in to the new board properly.  Its good to see everyone again.  I'm sure this is a repost but how do I get my old post counts back.  I don't want to be a newbie all over again.
Drop a PM to a mod and include your old post count ... or at least a rough idea on what it was.  That's what we did when we switched to the new board.  Should be able to take care of it for ya.
Hey Matt,hows the fishing on couch this winter?  Welcome back dude.

Thanks guys, I'll do that.  I haven't been out yet,  but a trip out to Sparrow Lake for Walleye and or Pike is being planned for Mid February.  Good to see you again Misfish!  Now if I can just figure out the avatars and personal info LOL

Welcome back Mat. Good to hear from you, I was just thinking that I hadn't seen or heard from you in quite a while.  I didn't worry about my post count, it made me feel younger  But as said, get hold of a mod and you should be able to recover your standing.
....Welcome back Matt. I can change your post count if you remember what it was. I'm unable to retrieve it myself as the old board is gone.
